reviewText: Great stories with a lot of heart in it and i can see the points about God that it is trying to demonstrate. i recommend touched by an angel very highly, it is a great family film and good to relax and enjoy
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Today,I received  my first copy of the Touched By An Angel Season 9 dads. It's such a wonderful show I gave it four stars, but I've waited for so many years, and there are absolutely no extras.....you'd think they would include at least one or two interviews of cast and crew that are not on the first season. (I have that already.) I mean they made us wait for ten years, and probably would never have got these released had it not been for the millions of loyal fans bugging them.  Still I am a big fan of the show. I love Roma Downey, I think what she's doing with the new theatrical movie,Son of God, is wonderful. I wish her and the whole cast of Touched By An Angel (minus John Dye, who died in 2011) well and lots of love and blessings in the future.
summary: Season Nine is both wonderful and dissapointing
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

I haven't bought any of the series, yet.  My finances, in this economy, are waiting for it to become available to Prime Instant video members.  If I could afford it, I'd get it now!Kim43

reviewText: I just received this and started to watch it.  I may be premature to judge it this early, but so far the plots are not as good as the earlier years.  However, it is still inspirational and a wonderful alternative to most of what is on TV.
summary: Too Bad it's the Final Season
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: At long last we are able to complete our collections of this wonderfully inspirational series. The episodes encompassing the series finale are worth the price of the DVD on their own. We can only hope there will be a series continuation in the form of 2-hour TV movies, to let us know what the angels are up to now. What work did Tess go into? How is Monica developing as a supervisor? Do Tess and Monica ever work together again?
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Wow! This is the day I've been waiting for - to complete my collection of TOUCHED BY AN ANGEL. Airing for 211 episodes and nine seasons ('94-'03), Touched By An Angel was/is a wonderful family friendly series that starred Roma Downey, Della Reese (who sang the show's inspiring and melodic theme song "I Will Walk With You"), John Dye and Valerie Bertinelli. The show maintained strong scripting and acting talent that had cross generational appeal for viewing audiences from all stratosphere's of society. This same audience longed for and desired quality programming that was rich with meaning and that would contain content that could be identified with (rather than the 'minus I.Q' programming that generally left us feeling as though we'd wasted an hour of precious time) and TOUCHED BY AN ANGEL delivered on the goods! When season 4 was released to DVD in December '07 and no forthcoming releases were announced, many fans (like myself) were devastated and disappointed, thinking that we would never see the remaining five seasons. Five years later, on July 24, 2012, Season 5 was released and the studio has gifted us with a release about every three months - and here we are with a release date of November 19, 2013 for this final season. I am one happy camper - can't wait to see that one last space on my DVD library shelf filled in for a completed collection. I especially appreciated that the series ended with closure with the episode "I Will Walk With You" which see Monica up for promotion, but not before going through a very challenging circumstance!This season enjoyed a nice roster of guest stars which included:Mary-Margaret Humes, Robert Pastorelli, Taylor Handley, Scott Christopher, Rachel Luttrell, Nancy Linehan Charles, Ryan Hurst, Stacy Edwards, Bob Gunton, Daniel Baldwin, Billy Aaron Brown, Nancy Everhard, Matt Malloy, Eddie Mills, Stacy Keach, William Stanford Davis, Charles Durning, Gavin Macleod, Jessica Walters, Wynonna Judd, Susan Dolan, Patrick Duffy, Patty Duke, Marion Ross, Randy Travis, Bob Bancroft, Cloris Leachman and many more!The episode list for this final season is as follows:1. A ROCK AND A HARD PLACE - The angels help out a father and son who are having a hard time bonding, and an elderly woman who wants to die so that she may once again be with her husband.2. THE SIXTEENTH MINUTE - A downtrodden office worker is given a taste of fame after he saves the life of a woman caught in a collapsed silver mine. But the man's heroism goes to his head and begins to affect his work.3. TWO SIDES TO EVERY ANGEL - Gloria and Monica take a trip to resolve their differences and find common ground, but Gloria's demonic twin causes problems.4. THE WORD - Monica becomes a substitute teacher for a class with learning disabilities and health problems, but finds one student in particular needs her help to cope with obsessive compulsive disorder.5. A FEATHER ON THE BREATH OF GOD - Events take an interesting turn when the angels try to help a dying woman find a home for her young daughter.6. JUMP! - The angels help a teenager who threatens to throw himself off an apartment building, and an embittered radio DJ who tries to take advantage of the situation to boost his ratings.7. BRING ON THE RAIN - The angels help a teenager who, ashamed of her home life, tries to pass herself off as being wealthy - but her deception soon comes to light and threatens her relationship with her mother.8. REMEMBERING ME (PART 1) - The angels try to help a success-minded man who is more interested in money than his family, but the mission gets complicated when Tess starts to show early signs of Alzheimer's disease.9. REMEMBERING ME (PART 2) - Tess's worsening condition frustrates Monica, who fears she will never be the same again. Meanwhile, the angels help a father after his adoption hearing is postponed when the paternal mother returns - years after abandoning her child in front of a burning building.10. THE CHRISTMAS WATCH - The angels pull out all the stops to raise the flagging spirits of a group of workers who receive bad news on Christmas Eve.11. PRIVATE EYES - The angels try to help a lonely investigator who has taken in a runaway teen as his own daughter and doesn't want to return her to her real father.12. AND A NIGHTINGALE SANG - The team intervenes on Valentine's Day when couples face a series of challenges to test their continued happiness.13. THE ROOT OF ALL EVIL - The angels help a priest lend guidance to troubled brothers on opposite sides of the law before a planned crime is carried out.14. A TIME FOR EVERY PURPOSE - The angels intervene with a man contemplating suicide because his wife has been killed and he has had Lou Gehrig's disease for two years.15. AS IT IS IN HEAVEN - A lost angel tries to find her way back to Heaven, with a little help from the divine heroines.16. SONG FOR MY FATHER - Divine intervention is the only option for a singer in danger of losing her voice.17. THE GOOD EARTH - An inventor needs the angel's help to complete his latest energy-saving device before he dies.18. VIRTUAL REALITY - A youngster obsessed with a violent computer game is accused of manslaughter, and the angels must discover whether he is guilty by questioning his troubled cousin.19. THE SHOW MUST NOT GO ON - A children's theatre is in desperate need of a revamp when its director suffers a fatal heart attack and a bunch of delinquents vandalize it. Unfortunately, the current staff of actors are too self-centered to help.20. AT THE END OF THE AISLE - The angels are reunited with an old friend on the eve of her wedding and must prevent her making a huge mistake.21. I WILL WALK WITH YOU (PART 1) - Monica is assigned to assist a doctor who is trying to open an AIDS hospice against the wishes of many residents of the city. Tess is along for the ride because there is a man there she knew as a small boy and she is hoping to see him again.22. I WILL WALK WITH YOU (PART 2) - Wayne tries to protect Zack, but soon realizes he's got his work cut out when his charge admits he was at the school on the day of the explosion - but has no alibi. Monica must overcome her revulsion at the person accused of killing schoolchildren in order to complete her assignment.Subtitles in English will be included for the hearing impaired.If you've never seen or been introduced to this wonderful series, it's never to late to 'jump in' - the show had wonderful lessons in life where something could be derived and learned from in EVERY episode and left you feeling uplifted before the closing credits started rolling. This is one worthwhile purchase, and oh by the way, keep a handkerchief handy - you'll need it! There's some good ones in this season! Enjoy :0)
summary: TOUCHED BY AN ANGEL THE NINTH AND FINAL SEASON  GETS A RELEASE DATE - NOVEMBER 19, 2013
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Having been warmed through our southern winter by Touched By An Angel The Eighth Season, I think I need cooling down now with this announcement of The Ninth and Final Season.  Thank you so So SO much CBS Paramount and Amazon for this perfect Christmas gift.  I so look forward to reliving the heartwrenching two part "Remembering Me"; "As It Is In Heaven" (featuring a compellingly beautiful performance by Lesley Ann Warren); Wynonna Judd's outstanding  performance as she brings her character's storyline to a conclusion in "At The End Of The Aisle"; and the fan favourite "I Will Walk With You".  Although there can never be another tv series quite like Touched By An Angel, fans who were hooked when it first went to air, PLUS, a whole new generation can now be "Touched" by the fact that the complete series is now available to enjoy for many years to come.
summary: I think I need cooling down.
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Always loved this television series and I requested this last season for my birthday.  Now my collection is complete and I couldn't be happier.  No matter what the day brings, when I pop in one of these TBA dvds, I am immediately uplifted and refreshed.  What an oasis in this crazy world!!
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: I recently checked this out from our library to see if I wanted to purchase it. Hmmmm, I never saw any of the 9th season, but I think other viewers touched on this...it just doesn't have the punch or pizazz of the other seasons. The story lines, were average, not spectacular. The last 2 part story just wasn't a good send off for a series that had been highly inspirational. I found it to be a huge let down, strange, and not very representational of what the show portrayed in previous episodes. And on the last season dvd, why isn't their any extra features, quite baffling. After 9 seasons, they could SAY anything about it???? Ok, and why did Carol Burnett do the sound bite intro for the last one, that was unusual, and out of no where.
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: This has my fave episode on it. Tess gets Altzheimer's.  Her work in that role is so touching.  This episode is also quite uplifting if you or a loved one are facing this terrible disease. I also found it quite thought provoking on the topic of aging in general.
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: I have all the DVD's of this series, and have found them most enjoyable and spiritually uplifting. Having all 9 years, plus the extra ones that were made gives me such pleasure, and peace of mind...
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Shows how angels help people get through life. Actors are great and funny. Della Reese is a gifted singer. Features guest stars, Randy Travis, for example.
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: After such a long hiatus, I was beginning to doubt we'd get the entire series. I'm so glad I was proven wrong! No other show touched me like one does! Thank you CBS and Paramount for making my favorite show available!
summary: Finally the Complete Series will be available!
Title: Touched By An Angel: The Ninth and Final Season
